alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 2:30PM AKST until December 15 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT AKST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Interior Bristol Bay from King Salmon, north, and from New Stuyahok, east. * WHEN...From 9 AM Wednesday to midnight AKST Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Increasing snow is anticipated on Wednesday with the arrival of a lifting front into Bristol Bay. The highest totals will likely be confined to northeastern portions of interior Bristol Bay from Igiugig to Iliamna. Lesser amounts are forecast for southern locations down into King Salmon, where there is potential for snow to mix with rain at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
